name: Tata Communications Limited
overview:
Tata Communications, a member of the $62.5 billion Tata Group, is a global provider of a new world of communications. The company leverages its advanced solutions capabilities and domain expertise across its global network to deliver solutions to service providers worldwide.

Servicing customers from its offices in over 80 cities in 40 countries, Tata Communications’ range of services include transmission, IP, converged voice, mobility, and business transformation. The company owns and operates the Tata Global Network, one of the most advanced and largest submarine cable networks with connectivity to more than 200 countries across 300 PoPs worldwide.

Tata Communications’ suite of offerings include Tata Communications CDN, a next-generation CDN designed for a wide range of applications; Tata Communications CDN Plus and CDN Secure, addvalue designed for the distribution and protection of media assets; and Tata Communications LiveBroadcast, a high quality, flash-based streaming service for broadcasters of live events.
